playn.core

Interface Canvas

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCanvasGL

    public interface Canvas
    A 2d drawing canvas.

    Colors are specified as integer ARGB values, with alpha in the most-significant byte.

    All methods that modify the Canvas return it to allow calls to be chained.

    TODO: - alpha (Flash and Java2D implementations are tricky). - textAlign? TODO (maybe): - textBaseline? Don't see it in Android. - font? Abstracting this is going to be tricky. - measureText? Canvas API is pretty anemic, but would be easy to implement on Android/Flash. - pattern repetition flags? Not clear that Flash supports them. Notes: - Clipping is going to be tricky in Flash. It requires that a separate DisplayObject be used as a "mask". I think this can be made to work with this API, but I'm not sure.

      Values that may be used with setLineJoin(LineJoin).

               float dx,
               float dy)
        Draws an image at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        dx - the destination x
        dy - the destination y

      • drawImageCentered

        Canvas drawImageCentered(Image image,
                       float dx,
                       float dy)
        Draws an image, centered at the specified location. Simply subtracts image.width/2 from dx and image.height/2 from dy.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to draw
        dx - destination x
        dy - destination y

      • drawImage

        Canvas drawImage(Image image,
               float dx,
               float dy,
               float dw,
               float dh)
        Draws a scaled image at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        dx - the destination x
        dy - the destination y
        dw - the destination width
        dh - the destination height

      • drawImage

        Canvas drawImage(Image image,
               float dx,
               float dy,
               float dw,
               float dh,
               float sx,
               float sy,
               float sw,
               float sh)
        Draws a scaled subset of an image at the specified location. TODO(jgw): Document whether out-of-bounds source coordinates clamp, repeat, or do nothing.
        Parameters:
        dx - the destination x
        dy - the destination y
        dw - the destination width
        dh - the destination height
        sx - the source x
        sy - the source y
        sw - the source width
        sh - the source height

        Canvas drawPoint(float x,
               float y)
        Draws a single point at the specified location.

      • drawText

        Canvas drawText(String text,
              float x,
              float y)
        Draws text at the specified location. The text will be drawn in the current fill color.

      • fillCircle

        Canvas fillCircle(float x,
                float y,
                float radius)
        Fills a circle at the specified center and radius.

        Canvas fillPath(Path path)
        Fills the specified path.

        Canvas fillRect(float x,
              float y,

      • fillRoundRect

        Canvas fillRoundRect(float x,
                   float y,
                   float width,
                   float height,
                   float radius)
        Fills the specified rounded rectangle.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the upper left of the rounded rectangle.
        y - the y coordinate of the upper left of the rounded rectangle.
        width - the width of the rounded rectangle.
        height - the width of the rounded rectangle.
        radius - the radius of the circle to use for the corner.

      • fillText

        Canvas fillText(TextLayout text,
              float x,
              float y)
        Fills the text at the specified location. The text will use the current fill color.

      • height

        float height()
        The height of this canvas.

      • restore

        Canvas restore()
        Restores the canvas's previous state.
        See Also:
        save()

      • rotate

        Canvas rotate(float radians)
        Rotates the current transformation matrix by the specified angle in radians.

      • save

        Canvas save()
        The save and restore methods preserve and restore the state of the canvas, but not specific paths or graphics. The following values are saved:
        • transformation matrix
        • clipping path
        • stroke color
        • stroke width
        • line cap
        • line join
        • miter limit
        • fill color or gradient
        • composite operation

      • scale

        Canvas scale(float x,
           float y)
        Scales the current transformation matrix by the specified amount.

      • setAlpha

        Canvas setAlpha(float alpha)
        Set the global alpha value to be used for all painting.

        Values outside the range [0,1] will be clamped to the range [0,1].

        Parameters:
        alpha - alpha value in range [0,1] where 0 is transparent and 1 is opaque

      • setCompositeOperation

        Canvas setCompositeOperation(Canvas.Composite composite)
        Sets the Porter-Duff composite operation to be used for all painting.

      • setFillColor

        Canvas setFillColor(int color)
        Sets the color to be used for fill operations. This replaces any existing fill gradient or pattern.

      • setFillGradient

        Canvas setFillGradient(Gradient gradient)
        Sets the gradient to be used for fill operations. This replaces any existing fill color or pattern.

      • setFillPattern

        Canvas setFillPattern(Pattern pattern)
        Sets the pattern to be used for fill operations. This replaces any existing fill color or gradient.

      • setLineCap

        Canvas setLineCap(Canvas.LineCap cap)
        Sets the line-cap mode for strokes.

      • setLineJoin

        Canvas setLineJoin(Canvas.LineJoin join)
        Sets the line-join mode for strokes.

      • setMiterLimit

        Canvas setMiterLimit(float miter)
        Sets the miter limit for strokes.

      • setStrokeColor

        Canvas setStrokeColor(int color)
        Sets the color for strokes.

      • setStrokeWidth

        Canvas setStrokeWidth(float strokeWidth)
        Sets the width for strokes, in pixels.

      • strokeCircle

        Canvas strokeCircle(float x,
                  float y,
                  float radius)
        Strokes a circle at the specified center and radius.

        Canvas strokePath(Path path)
        Strokes the specified path.

        Canvas strokeRect(float x,
                float y,
                float width,
                float height)
        Strokes the specified rectangle.

      • strokeRoundRect

        Canvas strokeRoundRect(float x,
                     float y,
                     float width,
                     float height,
                     float radius)
        Strokes the specified rounded rectangle.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the upper left of the rounded rectangle.
        y - the y coordinate of the upper left of the rounded rectangle.
        width - the width of the rounded rectangle.
        height - the width of the rounded rectangle.
        radius - the radius of the circle to use for the corner.

      • strokeText

        Canvas strokeText(TextLayout text,
                float x,
                float y)
        Strokes the text at the specified location. The text will use the current stroke configuration (color, width, etc.).

      • transform

        Canvas transform(float m11,
               float m12,

               float m22,
               float dx,
               float dy)
        Multiplies the current transformation matrix by the given matrix.

               float y)
        Translates the current transformation matrix by the given amount.

      • width

        float width()
        The width of this canvas.
